mapper.select:
select date, platform_name, advertise_active, sum(show_count) as showCount, sum(click_count) as clickCount, sum(speed_cost) as speedCost,
concat(date, '|', platform_name) as unionKey
concat(date, '|', platform_name, '|', advertise_active) as unionKey
from `media_item` where `fee_type` = #{dataSource}
and platform_name = #{platformName}
and advertise_active in
'${advertiseActive}'
group by `date`
,`platform_name`
,`advertise_active`
having `date` >= #{startDate} and `date` <= #{endDate}
